trans-unit.source: Provides theme settings for activity designers that use a preview mode on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece configurações de tema para designers de atividade que usam um modo de visualização na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Activity designers that use preview mode on the workflow design surface can have theme settings specific to the preview display area.
trans-unit.target: Designers de atividade que usam o modo de visualização na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho podem ter configurações de tema específicas para a área de exibição de visualização.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme> contains the properties that provide these preview-area specific settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme> contém as propriedades que fornecem essas configurações específicas da área de visualização.

trans-unit.source: Activities that provide a preview mode when they are added to the workflow design surface include <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Atividades que fornecem um modo de visualização quando eles são adicionados à superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho incluem <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> à qual a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme" /> está associada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Performs any additional initialization tasks for <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme" /> that is not performed by <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa as tarefas de inicialização adicionais para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme" /> que não são executadas pelo <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> is set to `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme.Initialize%2A> sets all <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme> properties to reflect the style settings of the operating system on which Windows Workflow Foundation is installed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> é definido como `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme.Initialize%2A> define todos os <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme> propriedades para refletir as configurações de estilo do sistema operacional no qual o Windows Workflow Foundation está instalado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty" /> enumeration value that the activity preview designer theme should now use.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty" /> que o tema do designer de visualização de atividade deve usar agora.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme" /> that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme" /> que as configurações de propriedade de ambiente do designer foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme.OnAmbientPropertyChanged%2A> checks the value passed to `ambientProperty` and applies the appropriate ambient theme settings based on that value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme.OnAmbientPropertyChanged%2A> verifica se o valor passado para `ambientProperty` e aplica as configurações de tema ambiente apropriado com base nesse valor.

trans-unit.source: If the value is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>, it applies the ambient styles provided by the designer.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>, ele aplica os estilos de ambiente fornecidos pelo designer.

trans-unit.source: If the value is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting>, it applies the ambient styles provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting>, ele aplica os estilos de ambiente fornecidos pelo sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color set to associate with the background of the activity preview section of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conjunto de cores a ser associado à tela de fundo da seção de visualização da atividade do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> to associate with the background of the activity preview section of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> para associar o plano de fundo da seção de visualização de atividade do designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color set to associate with the border of the activity preview section of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conjunto de cores a ser associado à borda da seção de visualização da atividade do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> to associate with the border of the activity preview section of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> para associar com a borda da seção de visualização de atividade do designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color set to associate with the foreground of the activity preview section of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conjunto de cores a ser associado ao primeiro plano da seção de visualização da atividade do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> to associate with the foreground of the activity preview section of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> para associar o primeiro plano da seção de visualização de atividade do designer.
